get.summary: Returns all AlarmEvents which fit the filter criteria supplied.  All filter parameters are optional.  AlarmEvents will be ordered and paged as requested.

parameters.name: alarmId
parameters.description: Return only AlarmEvent for the referenced Alarm.

parameters.name: priorityFrom
parameters.description: Return only AlarmEvent with a Priority greater or equal to the value supplied.

parameters.name: priorityTo
parameters.description: Return only AlarmEvent with a Priority less or equal to the value supplied.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Return only AlarmEvent with this State value.

parameters.name: acknowledgeable
parameters.description: Return only AlarmEvent with this Acknowledgeable value.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Return only AlarmEvent with this Type value.

parameters.name: originallyAlarmedOnOrAfter
parameters.description: Return only AlarmEvent with OccuredOn which is on or after this value.

parameters.name: originallyAlarmedBefore
parameters.description: Return only AlarmEvent with OccuredOn which is before this value.

parameters.name: transitionedOnOrAfter
parameters.description: Return only AlarmEvent with LastTransitionedOn which is on or after this value.

parameters.name: transitionedBefore
parameters.description: Return only AlarmEvent with LastTransitionedOn which is before this value.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: AlarmEvent will be returned in this order.  TransitionedAtAscending by default.

parameters.name: take
parameters.description: Number of AlarmEvent that should be returned.  200 by default.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Number of AlarmEvent that should be skipped before items are returned.  0 by default.

get.summary: Returns the AlarmEvent with the Id provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the AlarmEvent requested.  Must be double URL encoded.

get.summary: Returns the AlarmId property for the AlarmEvent with the Id provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the AlarmEvent whose AlarmId property is to be returned.  Must be double URL encoded.

get.summary: Returns the referenced Alarm for the AlarmEvent with the Id provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the AlarmEvent for which the referenced Alarm is to be returned.  Value must be double URL encoded

get.summary: Returns the Acknowledgeable property for the AlarmEvent with the Id provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the AlarmEvent whose Acknowledgeable property is to be returned.  Must be double URL encoded.

get.summary: Returns the OccurredOn property for the AlarmEvent with the Id provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the AlarmEvent whose OccurredOn property is to be returned.  Must be double URL encoded.

get.summary: Returns the LastTransitionedOn property for the AlarmEvent with the Id provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the AlarmEvent whose LastTransitionedOn property is to be returned.  Must be double URL encoded.

get.summary: Returns the Message property for the AlarmEvent with the Id provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the AlarmEvent whose Message property is to be returned.  Must be double URL encoded.

get.summary: Returns the Priority property for the AlarmEvent with the Id provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the AlarmEvent whose Priority property is to be returned.  Must be double URL encoded.

get.summary: Returns the State property for the AlarmEvent with the Id provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the AlarmEvent whose State property is to be returned.  Must be double URL encoded.

get.summary: Returns the Type property for the AlarmEvent with the Id provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the AlarmEvent whose Type property is to be returned.  Must be double URL encoded.

post.summary: Executes an Acknowledge operation on the AlarmEvent with the Id provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the AlarmEvent to acknowledge.  Must be double URL encoded.

post.summary: Creates a new AlarmEventType and returns it.

parameters.name: newItem
parameters.description: Definition of how the AlarmEventType will be created.

get.summary: Returns all AlarmEventTypes which fit the filter criteria supplied.  All filter parameters are optional.  AlarmEventTypes will be ordered and paged as requested.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Return only AlarmEventType whose name contains this value.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: AlarmEventType will be returned in this order.  NameAscending by default.

parameters.name: take
parameters.description: Number of AlarmEventType that should be returned.  200 by default.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Number of AlarmEvent that should be skipped before items are returned.

get.summary: Returns the AlarmEventType with the Id provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the AlarmEventType requested.  Must be double URL encoded.

get.summary: Returns the Description property for the AlarmEventType with the Id provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the AlarmEventType whose Description property is to be returned.  Must be double URL encoded.

put.summary: Modifies the Name property for the AlarmEventType with the Id provided to the new value supplied.  Returns the modified AlarmEventType.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the AlarmEventType whose Name property is to be modified.  Must be double URL encoded.

parameters.name: newValue
parameters.description: New Description value.

get.summary: Returns the Name property for the AlarmEventType with the Id provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the AlarmEventType whose Name property is to be returned.  Must be double URL encoded.

put.summary: Modifies the Name property for the AlarmEventType with the Id provided to the new value supplied.  Returns the modified AlarmEventType.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the AlarmEventType whose Name property is to be modified.  Must be double URL encoded.

parameters.name: newValue
parameters.description: New Name value.

patch.summary: Modifies the AlarmEventType with the Id provided to the values supplied.  Returns the modified AlarmEventType.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the AlarmEventType to be modified.  Must be double URL encoded.

parameters.name: newValues
parameters.description: Values to update the AlarmEventType with.

delete.summary: Deletes the AlarmEventType with the Id provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the AlarmEventType to be deleted.  Must be double URL encoded.

post.summary: Creates a new Alarm and returns it.

parameters.name: newItem
parameters.description: Definition of how the Alarm will be created.

get.summary: Returns all Alarms which fit the filter criteria supplied.  All filter parameters are optional.  Alarms will be ordered and paged as requested.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Return only Alarm whose name contains this value.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Return only Alarm with this State value.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Alarm will be returned in this order.  TransitionedAtAscending by default.

parameters.name: take
parameters.description: Number of Alarm that should be returned.  200 by default.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Number of Alarm that should be skipped before items are returned.  0 by default.

get.summary: Returns the Alarm with the Id provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Alarm requested.  Must be double URL encoded.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Alarm whose Description property is to be returned.  Must be double URL encoded.

parameters.description: Id of the Alarm whose Description property is to be modified.  Must be double URL encoded.

parameters.name: newValue
parameters.description: New Description value.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Alarm whose Name property is to be returned.  Must be double URL encoded.

put.summary: Modifies the Name property for the Alarm with the Id provided to the new value supplied.  Returns the modified Alarm.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Alarm whose Name property is to be modified.  Must be double URL encoded.

parameters.name: newValue
parameters.description: New Name value.

parameters.name: id

get.summary: Returns the ParentId property for the Alarm with the Id provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Alarm whose ParentId property is to be returned.  Must be double URL encoded.

put.summary: Modifies the ParentId property for the Alarm with the Id provided to the new value supplied.  Returns the modified Alarm.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Alarm whose ParentId property is to be modified.  Must be double URL encoded.

parameters.name: newValue
parameters.description: New ParentId value

get.summary: Returns the State property for the Alarm with the Id provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Alarm whose State property is to be returned.  Must be double URL encoded.

get.summary: Returns the TransitionModel property for the Alarm with the Id provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Alarm whose TransitionModel property is to be returned.  Must be double URL encoded.

get.summary: Returns the associated Value for the Alarm with the Id supplied.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Alarm who’s associated Value is to be returned.  Must be double URL encoded.

get.summary: Returns the ValueId property for the Alarm with the Id provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Alarm whose ValueId property is to be returned.  Must be double URL encoded.

patch.summary: Modifies the Alarm with the Id provided to the values supplied.  Returns the modified Alarm.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Alarm to be modified.  Must be double URL encoded.

parameters.name: updatedItem
parameters.description: Item to be updated.  All modfied properties will be changed.

put.summary: Modifies the Id property for the Alarm with the Id provided to the new value supplied.  Returns the modified Alarm.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Alarm whose Id property is to be modified.  Must be double URL encoded.

parameters.name: newValue
parameters.description: New Id value.

post.summary:
Executes an Acknowledge action on the Alarm with the Id provided.  The result will generate a new AlarmEvent based on the information contained in the newEvent parameter.  
Restrictions apply based on the TransitionModel of the Alarm.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Alarm to be Acknowledged.  Must be double URL encoded.

parameters.name: newEvent
parameters.description: Information to describe the generated AlarmEvent.

post.summary:
Executes an Activate action on the Alarm with the Id provided.  The result will generate a new AlarmEvent based on the information contained in the newEvent parameter.  
Restrictions apply based on the TransitionModel of the Alarm.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Alarm to be Acknowledged.  Must be double URL encoded.

parameters.name: newEvent
parameters.description: Information to describe the generated AlarmEvent.

post.summary:
Executes a Disable action on the Alarm with the Id provided.  The result will generate a new AlarmEvent based on the information contained in the newEvent parameter.  
Restrictions apply based on the TransitionModel of the Alarm.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Alarm to be Acknowledged.  Must be double URL encoded.

parameters.name: newEvent
parameters.description: Information to describe the generated AlarmEvent.

post.summary:
Executes a Reset action on the Alarm with the Id provided.  The result will generate a new AlarmEvent based on the information contained in the newEvent parameter.  
Restrictions apply based on the TransitionModel of the Alarm.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Alarm to be Acknowledged.  Must be double URL encoded.

parameters.name: newEvent
parameters.description: Information to describe the generated AlarmEvent.

post.summary:
Executes a manual state change action on the Alarm with the Id provided (Alarm must have an Unrestricted TransitionModel).  The result will generate a new AlarmEvent based on the information contained in the newEvent parameter.  
Restrictions apply based on the TransitionModel of the Alarm.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Alarm to be Acknowledged.  Must be double URL encoded.

parameters.name: newEvent
parameters.description: Information to describe the generated AlarmEvent.

delete.summary: Deletes the Alarm with the Id provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Alarm to be deleted.  Must be double URL encoded.

post.summary: Creates a new Container and returns it.

parameters.name: newItem
parameters.description: Definition of how the Container will be created.

get.summary: Returns all Container which fit the filter criteria supplied. All filter parameters are optional. Container will be ordered and paged as requested.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Return only Container whose name contains this value.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Filter by Type.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Container will be returned in this order.  NameAscending by default.

parameters.name: take
parameters.description: Number of Container that should be returned.  200 by default.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Number of Container that should be skipped before items are returned.  0 by default.

get.summary: Returns the Container with the Id provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Container requested.  Must be double URL encoded.

get.summary: Returns all children (Value, Alarm, Trend or Container) parented by the Container with the Id provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Container whose children are to be returned.  Must be double URL encoded.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Return only those children which are of this type.  All returned by default.

get.summary: Returns the Description property for the Container with the Id provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Container whose Description property is to be returned.  Must be double URL encoded.

put.summary: Modifies the Description property for the Container with the Id provided to the new value supplied.  Returns the modified Container.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Container whose Description property is to be modified.  Must be double URL encoded.

parameters.name: newValue
parameters.description: New Description value.

parameters.description: Id of the Container whose Name property is to be returned.  Must be double URL encoded.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Container whose Name property is to be modified.  Must be double URL encoded.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Container whose ParentId property is to be modified.  Must be double URL encoded.

parameters.name: newValue
parameters.description: New ParentId value.

get.summary: Returns the Type property for the Container with the Id provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Container whose Type property is to be returned.  Must be double URL encoded.

put.summary: Modifies the Type property for the Container with the Id provided to the new value supplied.  Returns the modified Container.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Container whose Type property is to be modified.  Must be double URL encoded.

parameters.name: newValue
parameters.description: New Type value.

patch.summary: Modifies the Container with the Id provided to the values supplied.  Returns the modified Container.

parameters.name: id

parameters.name: updatedItem
parameters.description: Item to be updated.  All modfied properties will be changed.

put.summary: Modifies the Id property for the Container with the Id provided to the new value supplied.  Returns the modified Container.

post.summary: Creates a new Notification and returns it.

parameters.name: newItem
parameters.description: Definition of how the Notification will be created.

get.summary: Returns all Notification which fit the filter criteria supplied. All filter parameters are optional. Notification will be ordered and paged as requested.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Return only Notification with this SubscriptionId value.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Notification will be returned in this order.  CreatedOnAscending by default.

parameters.name: take
parameters.description: Number of Notification that should be returned.  200 by default.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Number of Notification that should be skipped before items are returned.  0 by default.

get.summary: Returns the Notification with the Id provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Notification requested.  Must be double URL encoded.

get.summary: Returns the CreatedOn property for the Notification with the Id provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Notification whose CreatedOn property is to be returned.  Must be double URL encoded.

get.summary:
Returns NotificationItem for the Notification with the Id provided.  
Sort Order for the returned items depends on Subscription Type.  For ValueItemChanged and HierarchyChanged, the sort order is by ChangedAt.  For AlarmEventChanged, the sort order is by ChangedItemId.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Notification whose items are to be returned.  Must be double URL encoded.

parameters.name: take
parameters.description: Number of NotificationItems that should be returned.  200 by default.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Number of NotificationItems that should be skipped before items are returned.  0 by default.

get.summary: Returns the Subscription for the Notification with the Id supplied.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Notification whose Subscription is to be returned.  Must be double URL encoded.

get.summary: Returns the SubscriptionId property for the Notification with the Id provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Notification whose SubscriptionId property is to be returned.  Must be double URL encoded.

delete.summary: Deletes the Notification with the Id provided.  All NotificationItems will also be deleted.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Notification to be deleted.  Must be double URL encoded.

get.summary: Returns the root Container which all other data is rooted.

post.summary: Creates a new Subscription and returns it.

parameters.name: newItem
parameters.description: Definition of how the Subscription will be created.

get.summary: Returns all Subscription which fit the filter criteria supplied. All filter parameters are optional. Subscription will be ordered and paged as requested.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Return only Subscription with this Type value.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Subscription will be returned in this order.  ExpiresAscending by default.

parameters.name: take
parameters.description: Number of Subscription that should be returned.  200 by default.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Number of Subscription that should be skipped before items are returned.  0 by default.

get.summary: Returns the Subscription with the Id provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Subscription requested.  Must be double URL encoded.

get.summary: Returns the ExpiresOn property for the Subscription with the Id provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Subscription whose ExpiresOn property is to be returned.  Must be double URL encoded.

get.summary: Returns the Type property for the Subscription with the Id provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Subscription whose Type property is to be returned.  Must be double URL encoded.

get.summary: Returns the IsActive property for the Subscription with the Id provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Subscription whose IsActive property is to be returned.  Must be double URL encoded.

put.summary:
Renews the Subscription with the Id provided by the requested number of minutes.
Returns the renewed Subscription.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Subscription to be renewed.  Must be double URL encoded.

parameters.name: minutes
parameters.description: Value in minutes to extend the Subscription.

put.summary:
Terminates the Subscription with the Id.  Terminated Subscription no longer can be used to create Notification sessions.
Returns the terminated Subscription.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Subscription to update.  Requires double URL encoding.

delete.summary: Deletes the Subscription with the Id provided.  All Notification and NotificationItem created from the Subscription will also be deleted.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Subscription to be deleted.  Must be double URL encoded.

delete.summary: Deletes Notification for the Subscription with the Id provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Subscription to act on.  Requires double URL encoding.

get.summary: Returns the Unit property for the Trend with the Id provided.

parameters.description: Item to be updated.  All modfied properties will be changed.  Requires double URL encoding.

delete.summary: Deletes the Trend with the Id provided.  All TrendSample associated with the Trend will also be deleted.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Trend to be deleted.  Must be double URL encoded.

delete.summary:
Deletes a range of TrendSample associated with the Trend with the Id provided.  
Open ended ranges are supported.  If sampleDateRange is not included all TrendSample will be deleted for the Trend.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Trend for which TrendSample are to be deleted.  Must be double URL encoded.

parameters.name: sampleDateRange
parameters.description: Only TrendSample with a SampleDate in this range will be deleted.

get.summary: Returns all TrendSample which fit the filter criteria supplied. All filter parameters are optional except trendId. TrendSample will be ordered and paged as requested.

parameters.name: trendId
parameters.description: The Id of the Trend which TrendSample are to be returned for.  This parameter is not optional.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Return only TrendSample with this State value.

parameters.name: sampledOnOrAfter
parameters.description: Return only TrendSample with SampleDate which is on or after this value.

parameters.name: sampledBefore
parameters.description: Return only TrendSample with SampleDate which is before this value.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: TrendSample will be returned in this order.  SampleDateAscending by default..

parameters.name: take
parameters.description: Number of TrendSample that should be returned.  200 by default.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Number of TrendSample that should be skipped before items are returned.  0 by default.

get.summary: Returns the TrendSample with the Id provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the TrendSample requested.  Must be double URL encoded.

get.summary: Returns the State property for the TrendSample with the Id provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the TrendSample whose State property is to be returned.  Must be double URL encoded.

get.summary: Returns the SampleDate property for the AlarmEvent with the Id provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the TrendSample whose SampleDate property is to be returned.  Must be double URL encoded.

get.summary: Returns the TrendModel for the TrendSample with the supplied Id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the TrendSample whose TrendModel is to be returned.  Requires double URL encoding.

get.summary: Returns the TrendId property for the AlarmEvent with the Id provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the TrendSample whose TrendId property is to be returned.  Must be double URL encoded.

get.summary: Returns the Value for the TrendSample with the supplied Id.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the TrendSample whose Value is to be returned.  Requires double URL encoding.

post.summary: Creates a new Value and returns it.

parameters.name: newItem
parameters.description: Definition of how the Value will be created.

get.summary: Returns all Value which fit the filter criteria supplied. All filter parameters are optional. Value will be ordered and paged as requested.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Return only Value whose name contains this value.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Return only Value with this Type value.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Value will be returned in this order.  NameAscending by default.

parameters.name: take
parameters.description: Number of Value that should be returned.  200 by default.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Number of Value that should be skipped before items are returned.  0 by default.

get.summary: Returns the Value with the Id provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Value requested.  Must be double URL encoded.

get.summary: Returns the Description property for the Value with the Id provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Value whose Description property is to be returned.  Must be double URL encoded.

put.summary: Modifies the Description property for the Value with the Id provided to the new value supplied.  Returns the modified Value.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Value whose Description property is to be modified.  Must be double URL encoded.

parameters.name: newValue
parameters.description: New Description value.

get.summary: Returns the Forceable property for the Value with the Id provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Value whose Forceable property is to be returned.  Must be double URL encoded.

put.summary: Modifies the Forceable property for the Value with the Id provided to the new value supplied.  Returns the modified Value.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Value whose Forceable property is to be modified.  Must be double URL encoded.

parameters.name: newValue
parameters.description: New Forceable value.

get.summary: Returns the Name property for the Value with the Id provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Value whose Name property is to be returned.  Must be double URL encoded.

put.summary: Modifies the Name property for the Value with the Id provided to the new value supplied.  Returns the modified Value.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Value whose Name property is to be modified.  Must be double URL encoded.

parameters.name: newValue
parameters.description: New Name value.

get.summary: Returns the parent Container for the Value with the Id supplied.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Value whose parent Container is to be returned.  Must be double URL encoded.

get.summary: Returns the ParentId property for the Container with the Id provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Value whose ParentId property is to be returned.  Must be double URL encoded.

put.summary: Modifies the ParentId property for the Value with the Id provided to the new value supplied.  Returns the modified Value.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Value whose ParentId property is to be modified.  Must be double URL encoded.

parameters.name: newValue
parameters.description: New ParentId value.

get.summary: Returns the State property for the Value with the Id provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the State whose Type property is to be returned.  Must be double URL encoded.

put.summary: Modifies the State property for the Value with the Id provided to the new value supplied.  Returns the modified Value.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the State whose Type property is to be modified.  Must be double URL encoded.

parameters.name: newValue
parameters.description: New State value.

get.summary: Returns the Type property for the Value with the Id provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Value whose Type property is to be returned.  Must be double URL encoded.

put.summary: Modifies the Type property for the Value with the Id provided to the new value supplied.  Returns the modified Value.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Value whose Type property is to be modified.  Must be double URL encoded.

parameters.name: newValue
parameters.description: New Type value.

get.summary: Returns the Unit property for the Value with the Id provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Value whose Unit property is to be returned.  Must be double URL encoded.

put.summary: Modifies the Unit property for the Value with the Id provided to the new value supplied.  Returns the modified Value.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Value whose Unit property is to be modified.  Must be double URL encoded.

parameters.name: newValue
parameters.description: New Unit value.

get.summary: Returns the Value property for the Value with the Id provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Value whose Value property is to be returned.  Must be double URL encoded.

put.summary: Modifies the Value property for the Value with the Id provided to the new value supplied.  Returns the modified Value.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Value whose Value property is to be modified.  Must be double URL encoded.

parameters.name: newValue
parameters.description: New Value value.

get.summary: Returns the Writeable property for the Value with the Id provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Value whose Writeable property is to be returned.  Must be double URL encoded.

put.summary: Modifies the Writeable property for the Value with the Id provided to the new value supplied.  Returns the modified Value.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Value whose Writeable property is to be modified.  Must be double URL encoded.

parameters.name: newValue
parameters.description: New Writeable value.

patch.summary: Modifies the Value with the Id provided to the values supplied.  Returns the modified Value.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Value to be modified.  Must be double URL encoded.

parameters.name: updatedItem
parameters.description: Values to update the Value with.

put.summary: Modifies the Id property for the Value with the Id provided to the new value supplied.  Returns the modified Value.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Value whose Id property is to be modified.  Must be double URL encoded.

parameters.name: newValue
parameters.description: New Id value.

put.summary:
Forces the Value with the Id provided.  
After this action the Value will have a State of Forced and a Value equal to the forcedValue parameter.  Returns the modified Value.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Value to be forced.  Must be double URL encoded.

parameters.name: forcedValue
parameters.description: Value which the Value will be forced to.

put.summary:
Unforces the Value with the Id provided.  
After this action the Value will have a State and Value which depends on configured Data Provider.  Returns the modified Value.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Value to update.  Requires double URL encoding.

delete.summary: Deletes the Value with the Id provided.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the Value to be deleted.  Must be double URL encoded.

AlarmEventModel.description:
An AlarmEvent represents the transition of an Alarm through the state transition model implemented.  
Every transition for an Alarm, including a return to normal generates an AlarmEvent instance.

AlarmId.description: Optional Id of the associated Alarm.

OccurredOn.description: DateTime in UTC when the Alarm most recently transitioned into and “alarmed” state - that is not in the "Normal" state.

LastTransitionedOn.description: DateTime oin UTC when the transition captured by this AlarmEvent occurred.

Message.description: Human readable message for the AlarmEvent.

State.description: State this AlarmEvent transition is documenting.

Type.description: Server specific type of the AlarmEvent.

Id.description: Case sensitive identifier for the entity.

AlarmModel.description:
The existence of an Alarm does not imply that an alarm has occurred, only that alarm criteria exists.  
Typically, this is done for a specific Value but this is not required.  If alarm is associated with a Value, the Id of that Value should be included.

ValueId.description: Optional Id of a Value this Alarm is associated with.

TransitionModel.description: The transition model for the Alarm.

ParentId.description: Id of the Container which the Alarm is found in.

Id.description: Case sensitive identifier for the entity.

NewAlarmEventTypeModel.description: Describes how an AlarmEventTYpe will be created.

AlarmEventTypeModel.description: An AlarmEventType represents a server specific a Type for an AlarmEvent.

Id.description: Case sensitive identifier for the entity.

UpdateAlarmEventTypeModel.description: Describes how a Trend will be patched.

NewAlarmModel.description: Describes how an Alarm will be created.

ValueId.description: Optional Id of a Value this Alarm is associated with.

TransitionModel.description: The transition model for the Alarm.

ParentId.description: Id of the Container which the Alarm is found in.

Id.description: Case sensitive identifier for the entity.

ContainerModel.description: A Container is the parent for other types; namely Value, Alarm, Container, Trend, and Enum.

Type.description: Specifies the type of the Container.

ParentId.description: Id of the Container which the Container is found in.

Id.description: Case sensitive identifier for the entity.

ValueModel.description:
Represents a singular point value.  
Point values can be physical values from a sensor or controller, internal properties such as a software version, or any other value an implementing server decides to expose.

Type.description: Implied type of the Values value property.

Value.description: Actual value of the Value.  This is always represented as a string regardless of Type.

ParentId.description: Id of the Container which the Value is found in.

Id.description: Case sensitive identifier for the entity.

UpdateAlarmModel.description: Describes how an Alarm will be patched.

ParentId.description: Id of the Container which the Alarm is found in.

Id.description: Case sensitive identifier for the entity.

AlarmEventInfo.description: Represents the information needed when generating an AlarmEvent for an Alarm.

Message.description: The Message to be given with the generated AlarmEvent.

Type.description: The Type of to be given with the generated AlarmEvent.

Priority.description: The Priority to be given to the genreated AlarmEvent.

AlarmEventStateChangeInfo.description: Represents the information needed when manually generating an AlarmEvent for an Alarm.

NewState.description: The new State value for the AlarmEvent.

NewAcknowledgeable.description: The new Acknowledgeable value for the AlarmEvent.

Message.description: The Message to be given with the generated AlarmEvent.

Type.description: The Type of to be given with the generated AlarmEvent.

Priority.description: The Priority to be given to the genreated AlarmEvent.

NewContainerModel.description: Describes how an Container will be created.

Type.description: Specifies the type of the Container.

ParentId.description: Id of the Container which the Container is found in.

Id.description: Case sensitive identifier for the entity.

ParentId.description: Id of the Container which the item is found in.

UpdateContainerModel.description: Describes how a Container will be patched.

Type.description: Specifies the type of the Container.

ParentId.description: Id of the Container which the Container is found in.

Id.description: Case sensitive identifier for the entity.

NewNotificationModel.description: Describes how a Notification will be created for a give Subscription.

SubscriptionId.description: Id of the Subscription the Notification will be created under.

ChangesOnly.description: If true, all items will be returned.  If false, only changes since the last Notification for the Subscription will be created.

NotificationModel.description: A Notification represents a logical session of NotificationItem for a Subscription at point in time.

SubscriptionId.description: The Subscription that this Notification is for.

CreatedOn.description: DateTime in UTC when the Notification session was created.

Id.description: Case sensitive identifier for the entity.

NotificationItemModel.description: A NotificationItem represents a single event notification for given Notification session belonging to a Subscription.

SubscriptionId.description: The Subscription that this NotificationItem is for.

NotificationId.description: The Notification that this NotificationItem is for.

ChangeType.description: The type of change this is a NotificationItem for.

ChangedItemId.description: Id of the item that changed.

ChangedItemType.description: The type of entity which ChangedItemId refers to.

ChangedAt.description: The DateTime in UTC when the change occurred.  Not available for all ChangeType.

Value.description: The Value at the time of the change.  (ChangeType = ValueItemChanged only).

ValueState.description: The State at the time of the change.  (ChangeType = ValueItemChanged only).

AlarmEventState.description: The Alarm State at the time of the change.  (ChangeType = AlarmEventChanged only).

Id.description: Case sensitive identifier for the entity.

SubscriptionModel.description: A Subscription is as data registration to one or more items for the purpose of creating Notification sessions to retrieve NotificationItem when the subscribed items have changed.

Type.description: Defines the type of items which are being subscribed to.

IsActive.description: Indicates if the Subscription is active and new Notification can be generated.

ExpiresOn.description: DateTime in UTC when the Subscription will expire.

Id.description: Case sensitive identifier for the entity.

DurationInMinutes.description: The requested  duration of the Subscription.

SubscriptionType.description: The type of data to Subscribe to.

Ids.description: List of Ids of items which are being Subscribed to.

PriorityFrom.description: For AlarmEventChanged and SystemEventChanged subscriptions, only items with Priority at or above this value will be included.

PriorityTo.description: For AlarmEventChanged and SystemEventChanged subscriptions, only items with Priority below this value will be included.

Types.description: For AlarmEventChanged and SystemEventChanged subscriptions, only items with a Type in this List will be included.

SystemEventModel.description: A SystemEvent represents the occurrence of a server specific event.

Type.description: Server specific type of the SystemEvent.

Message.description: Human readable message for the SystemEvent.

OccurredOn.description: DateTime when the SystemEvent was generated.

SourceId.description: Id for a server specific "source" of the SystemEvent.

SourceName.description: Name for the server specific "source" of the SystemEvent.

Id.description: Case sensitive identifier for the entity.
Case sensitive identifier for the entity.

NewTrendModel.description: Describes how an Container will be created.

ValueId.description: Id of the Value for which trending data will be captured.

ParentId.description: Id of the Container which the Trend is found in.

Id.description: Case sensitive identifier for the entity.

TrendModel.description:
A Trend references a specific Value for which historical value "trending" has been enabled.
The existence of a Trend does not imply that history exists; only that history will be captured for a Value.

ValueId.description: Id of the Value for which trending data will be captured.

ParentId.description: Id of the Container which the Trend is found in.

Id.description: Case sensitive identifier for the entity.

UpdateTrendModel.description: Describes how a Trend will be patched.

ParentId.description: Id of the Container which the Trend is found in.

Id.description: Case sensitive identifier for the entity.

DateRange.description: A simple model to represent open ended range of dates.

OnOrAfter.description: Lower limit of the range.  Range wil include all dates on or after this value.

Before.description: Uppwer limit of the range.  Range will include all dates before this value.

TrendSampleModel.description: A TrendSample represents the value and state for Value at a given point in time belonging to a specific Trend.

TrendId.description: Id of the Trend this is a sample for.

Value.description: Value of the Trend.Value at the time of the sample.

State.description: State of the Trend.Value at the time of the sample.

SampleDate.description: DateTime in UTC when the sample was created.

Id.description: Case sensitive identifier for the entity.

NewValueModel.description: Describes how a Value will be created.

Type.description: Implied type of the Values value property.

Value.description: Actual value of the Value.  This is always represented as a string regardless of Type.

ParentId.description: Id of the Container which the Value is found in.

Id.description: Case sensitive identifier for the entity.

UpdateValueModel.description: Describes how a Value will be patched.

Type.description: Implied type of the Values value property.

Value.description: Actual value of the Value.  This is always represented as a string regardless of Type.

ParentId.description: Id of the Container which the Value is found in.

Id.description: Case sensitive identifier for the entity.
